## Title - English
Gravenhurst, Ontario. Beaver Creek Institution. Sanitary Sewer System

March 9, 2023 14:00:00 (Note: There was an amendment to the closing time)

February 17, 2023

April 14, 2023

## Expected Contract End Date
December 31, 2024

## Tender Status
Expired

## UNSPSC Code
72000000 - Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services

## UNSPSC Description
The tender is for building and facility construction and maintenance services for the installation and upgrade of the sanitary sewer system at Beaver Creek Institution.

## Procurement Category
CNST - Construction Services

## Notice Type
Invitation to Qualify

## Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

## Selection Criteria
The tender will be awarded based on the lowest price.

## Quote or Tendering Reason
This tender is a public tender, and all interested bidders are invited to participate.

## Trade Agreements
The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Regions of Opportunity
Canada, specifically Gravenhurst, Ontario

## Regions of Delivery
Canada, specifically Gravenhurst, Ontario

## Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## End User Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Contact Information

sheila.dhanna@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Please note that the contact person is available Monday to Friday, 8:30 am to 5:00 pm EST
